Create yours today.Get StartedDSC_0307.JPGEnvironmental ProtectionZebrafish ResearchDSC_0307.JPGBONDESSON LABThe main goals of our Research Lab are to identify toxic chemicals among environmental pollutants and to decipher the mechanisms by which they act. Our ultimate goal is protect humans and wildlife from exposure to toxic chemicals. Learn more about our research and areas of study at this website.Home: OverviewContact UsMaria BondessonSimon HallIndiana University Bloomingtonmbondess@iu.edu(812) 855-1709Home: Contactbottom of page
